Car Rental System
  • Home
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserServiceService } from 'src/app/services/user-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { userPayload:any constructor(private userService:UserServiceService,private route:Router){ this.userPayload=this.userService.userPayload; } onLogout(){ localStorage.clear(); this.route.navigateByUrl(""); } }
